caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain foreign entities.
summary: This bill prohibits entities from designated countries that pose national security risks (as identified by US Intelligence) from purchasing real property in Texas. This affects Chinese entities since China is consistently listed in Annual Threat Assessments. The ban applies to governmental entities, organizations headquartered in or controlled by designated countries. Existing Chinese property ownership is not affected, but new purchases will be blocked.
translation: 该法案禁止来自被美国情报机构认定为对国家安全构成威胁的指定国家的实体购买德克萨斯州的不动产。由于中国在年度威胁评估中被持续列入，这项法案将影响中国实体，包括政府机构、总部设在中国或受中国政府控制的组织。法案不影响现有的中国人房产所有权，但将阻止新的购买行为。
committees:
1. House State Affairs Committee
2. House Business Industry Committee
3. House Homeland Security Public Safety Committee
